entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 12:17 PM PDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
